testsgen.wttools
Class ClassUtil

java.lang.Object
  testsgen.wttools.ClassUtil

public class ClassUtil
extends java.lang.Object

ClassUtil.java implements some useful and simple String transformations. These transformations are class related.

It means that it contains methods for accessing package name, short class name, transformation from source class name to test class name and so on.

Created: Tue Dec 04 15:51:38 2001

Version:
$Revision: 1.10 $
Author:
Artur Hefczyc
